meta.title: About Me
meta.description: My career in technology began in system and network administration, where I built a strong foundation in IT infrastructure over seven years. Driven by a passion for creating solutions, I transitioned my focus to software development. For over a decade, I've operated as a freelance developer and IT consultant, collaborating with diverse organizations like sports clubs and non-profits. I specialize in transforming complex business requirements into efficient, end-to-end digital solutions—from comprehensive e-learning platforms to automated systems that replace entire manual workflows. Technically, I am proficient in backend development with C# / .NET and both MS SQL and PostgreSQL , while on the frontend, I excel with modern frameworks like Vue.js and TypeScript. I am dedicated to building user-centric, maintainable applications and enjoy taking innovative ideas from concept to launch.
meta.keywords: software developer, web developer, full-stack developer, web technologies, web applications, websites, modern technologies

biography.title: Biography
biography.content: Hello, my name is Evren Yeniev. I began my career specializing in server and network systems, gaining expertise in this field over 12 years. Later, my interest in programming led me to pursue a degree in software engineering, shifting my focus to the web-based software field, where I’ve now been working for the past 9 years. On the backend, I primarily work with ASP.NET and ASP.NET Core alongside MS SQL, while my frontend toolkit includes HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, and Vue.js. I’m committed to writing clean, maintainable code and strictly adhere to design principles to ensure my work is both efficient and visually appealing. My passion lies in building responsive, user-friendly web applications that meet modern standards for functionality and performance. Whether it’s creating a straightforward website or a complex application, I strive to bring innovative ideas to life with precision and attention to detail.

goztepe.title: Göztepe Sports Club
goztepe.description: For the Göztepe Sports Club website, I developed a robust and scalable infrastructure to manage both the website and mobile application. On the backend, I utilized .NET Core Web API, Docker, and MS SQL to ensure a powerful, secure, and flexible system. The frontend is built with Vue.js, SASS, TypeScript, Pinia, Docker, and Jest to deliver a responsive and interactive user experience. This platform allows seamless management of all sports departments and teams, covering athletes, matches, and related standings or tournament results. Additionally, it includes accessible ticket organization for disabled fans, as well as the design of all interactive surveys and forms, providing a comprehensive digital solution for the club’s needs.

onarim.title: Onarim GmbH
onarim.description: For the Onarim GmbH website, serving clients in Turkey and Germany, I designed and developed a fully responsive, multi-language platform compatible with all devices. Using Figma for all component and layout designs, I implemented the website with .NET Core Web API, Vue, and SASS technologies. This combination ensures seamless adaptability across various screen sizes and provides a smooth, user-friendly experience. The result is a modern, bilingual digital presence that effectively supports Onarim GmbH’s international reach and commitment to quality service.

turmepa.title: Turmepa Web Akademi
turmepa.description: For the Deniz Temiz Association (TURMEPA) website, designed to raise awareness about the Sustainable Development Goals and climate change and to provide access to reliable information, I implemented a fully responsive, device-compatible platform. The site features PDF documents that are securely stored and published online, along with video integration through YouTube, all managed through a user-friendly admin panel. Built with .NET Core Web API, JavaScript, SASS, and Docker, the platform ensures seamless management and access across various devices, supporting TURMEPA’s mission with both accessibility and reliability.

thenbaexhibition.title: The NBA Exhibition
thenbaexhibition.description: For The NBA Exhibition website, focusing on the lifestyle, culture, and history of the National Basketball Association, I transformed the complete Figma design—comprising all components and pages—into a single-page application. Built using JavaScript and SASS, the site brings the exhibition’s visual appeal to life with a smooth, engaging user experience. This streamlined design effectively captures the essence of the NBA, providing visitors with an immersive, cohesive digital experience that mirrors the exhibition’s dynamic content and storytelling.
